name: Black Valentino Garavani
description: Low-top buffed leather and suede sneakers in black. Round toe. Lace-up closure. Logo flag at padded tongue. Padded collar. Signature tonal rubberized pyramid stud detailing at sides and heel counter. Foam rubber midsole in tan.

name: TRIPLE S LEATHER SNEAKERS
description: Fashion legend Cristóbal Balenciaga founded his couture house in 1918. With collections made of strong perfection, in a waltz of dramatic, sculptural designs and feminine yet modern silhouettes.

name: ROCKRUNNER PLUS SNEAKERS
description: Multicolour leather/fabric camouflage Rockrunner sneakers from VALENTINO GARAVANI featuring logo patch at the tongue, front lace-up fastening, round toe and ridged rubber sole.

name: Black & White Oversized Sneakers
description: Low-top ‘smooth’ calfskin sneakers in black. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo stamp in silver-tone at padded tongue and white calfskin heel tab. Perforated detailing at sides. Textured rubber sole in white.

name: Red Medusa High-Top Sneakers
description: High-top calfskin sneakers in red. Round toe with perforated detailing. Black lace-up closure. Padded collar. Rubber panels with signature sculpted Medusa at outer sides. Rubber island sole in white. Tonal stitching.

name: Black Leather
description: Buffed leather and rubber slip-on sandals in black. Open round toe. Buffed leather strap and Velcro fastening with rubberized logo at vamp. Tonal rubber sole. Tonal stitching. Upper: leather, rubber.

name: Orange Valentino
description: Low-top ‘smooth’ calfskin sneakers in black. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo stamp in silver-tone at padded tongue and white calfskin heel tab. Perforated detailing at sides. Textured rubber sole in white.

name: Black Zucca Zeppa Boots
description: Ankle-high distressed leather boots in black. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Tonal leather lining. Tonal stacked leather heel. Tonal leather and rubber sole. Tonal stitching. Approx. 1.25″ heel. Upper: leather. Sole: rubber, leather. Made in Italy.
